seriesJson.title: The music makers
seriesJson.description: Distinguished Americans discuss their profession of music, from composition to criticism; the business of music and its current place in our national culture.

node.title: Virgil Thomson
node.description: This program focuses on composer and critic Virgil Thomson.

node.title: Sarah Caldwell
node.description: This program focuses on opera conductor Sarah Caldwell.

node.title: Peter Mennin
node.description: This program focuses on composer Peter Mennin.

node.title: John McClure
node.description: This program focuses on record producer and engineer John McClure.

node.title: Eugene Ormandy
node.description: This program focuses on conductor and violinist Eugene Ormandy.

node.title: Irving Kolodin
node.description: This program focuses on music critic and music historian Irving Kolodin.

node.title: Norman Isaacs
node.description: This program focuses on Norman Isaacs, President of Louisville Philharmonic Society.

node.title: Robert Whitney
node.description: This program focuses on conductor Robert Whitney

node.title: Aaron Copland
node.description: This program focuses on composer Aaron Copland.

node.title: Isaac Stern
node.description: This program focuses on violinist Isaac Stern.
